deweather: Remove the influence of weather on air quality data

Source: R/deweather-package.R
deweather-package.Rd

Model and account for (or remove) the effect of meteorology on atmospheric composition data. The technique uses boosted regression trees via the tidymodels framework.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://openair-project.github.io/deweather/

  • https://github.com/openair-project/deweather

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/openair-project/deweather/issues
